channel.title: Npc Direction
channel.description:
Hey, I add some Npc's in my autospawn list.... but they are always look to to the south.... How i can change this?
Plzz... Helmp me!

item.title: Npc Direction
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

It’s in autospawn.cfg
as ytuio9 said.

In autospawn.cfg you should see something like:

spawn = 605 3085 3483 0 0 0 0 0 1

Considering I haven’t worked on RSPS for about 2 years and I’m doing this off the top of my head, I apologise If I am wrong, but!
I am certain that it’s either the last number or the one before.

Some servers have it set out like this:

FaceSouth FaceNorth FaceEast FaceWest
1 0 0 0

Therefore representing the 1 as ‘true/yes’ or Boolean.
And the 0 as ‘false/no’.

Others have it so that:
FaceDirectionX
1

1 = South
2 = North
3 = East
4 = West
(ABOVE IS LIKELY TO BE INCORRECT AS I JUST GUESSED)
But changing a number somewhere in Autospawn.cfg on the desired NPC will definately change it’s Direction or Height.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Direction
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

i dont think so, the autospawn doesnt have a directional spot. i think

item.title: Npc Direction
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

when i’m home i’ll hep you with this, but it’s one of the numbers in your autospawn code (probably the one that’s always -1? idk)
edit:
i believe it’s the last number, and the third one is your height level. change the numbers from 0-3 (or was it 1-4?) and you’ll change directions.

Read full topic
